mapper.select:
select count(id) from emp_contract
1 = 1 and is_deleted = 'n'

select id from emp_contract
1 = 1 and is_deleted = 'n'
select * from emp_contract where is_deleted='n' and status='A' and end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update emp_contract set template_id = #{templateId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select work_no,name from emp_contract where is_deleted='n' and status='A' and new_contract_type in ('chinaLabor','vietnamLabor','employeeLaborContract') group by work_no,name having count(work_no)>1

select count(id) from emp_contract
1 = 1 and is_deleted = 'n'

select id from emp_contract
1 = 1 and is_deleted = 'n'
select * from emp_contract where is_deleted='n' and status='A' and end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update emp_contract set template_id = #{templateId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select work_no,name from emp_contract where is_deleted='n' and status='A' and new_contract_type in ('chinaLabor','vietnamLabor','employeeLaborContract') group by work_no,name having count(work_no)>1
